message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $180 is a bit high for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I understand that $160 is still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $150. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so I hope you'll consider it.
I understand that you're willing to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, Bob. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its quality and value. If you're not willing to meet me at $150, I'm going to have to consider other options.
